definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: An engineering approach to the determination of the inertia properties of the fuel in external tanks is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了外挂副油箱中油液惯性特性的工程处理方法。

sentences.english: For example: Left wing number 2-fuel access door is deformed.
sentences.chinese: 左大翼二号油箱盖板变形。

sentences.english: Verify that the fuel tank cap is in place and secure.
sentences.chinese: 检查以下车辆的油箱盖是否盖紧盖牢。

sentences.english: They can also carry two 480 litre or 720 litre drop tanks.
sentences.chinese: 它们也能携带二副480公升或720公升副油箱。

sentences.english: The fuel tank is used to store fuel oil.
Then put the nozzle into your gas tank.
sentences.chinese: 然后把油枪嘴放进油箱里。

sentences.english: Drain fuel tank dry into holding tank or a properly labeled diesel safety container.
sentences.chinese: 排干燃油箱至收容箱或适当标志为迪塞尔的安全容器。

sentences.english: The fuel bank with capacity of 108 kg of petrol, is located in the upper part of the cabin.
sentences.chinese: 108千克储量的油箱位于驾驶室顶部。

sentences.english: I need to pull into a gas stine and fill up.
sentences.chinese: 我必要把车开进一个汽油站把油箱灌满。

sentences.english: I made a great lap time even though the gas tank was full.
sentences.chinese: 尽管油箱很满，我还是做了一个很棒的圈速。

sentences.english: Do not open the fuel tank cap while the engine is running or when the engine is hot.
sentences.chinese: 当发动机正在运转或温度高时，请勿揭开油箱盖。

sentences.english: Use of a desiccant breather keeps air entering a reservoir clean and dry.
sentences.chinese: 使用了干燥剂喘息的空气不断进入油箱的清洁及干燥。

sentences.english: The petrol in the tank is leaking out.
sentences.chinese: 油箱里的汽油正往外漏。

sentences.english: Don't jump the gun . I just want to remind you to close the gas tank cap.
sentences.chinese: 不要太快生气，我只是想提醒你油箱盖忘了关上了。

sentences.english: Thoroughly washed after the fuel pump and fuel tank, troubleshooting.
sentences.chinese: 彻底清洗汽油泵和油箱后，故障排除。

definition: oil spill/oil leak/(fig.) boo! (opposite of 加油[jia1 you2])
to top up/to fill to the brim
cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)
